sect1.title: Actionset
sect1.para: Actionsets are a way to capsulate many actions with specific options into some kind of a package.

For example if you use PHP\Manipulator as part of your build or deploy-process, you can create an actionset which runs all your actions with specified parameters. Or you can define an Actionset which forms you own Coding-Guidelines to automatically format your Code according to you defined set of Actions.
